channel.title: Check Out the Latest News from the World of Rock and Metal on Loud Legends
channel.description: Recent content in Check Out the Latest News from the World of Rock and Metal on Loud Legends

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne Reacts to Jake E. Lee’s Shooting in Las Vegas
item.description: Jake E. Lee was shot multiple times while walking his dog in Las Vegas, but is expected to recover.

item.title: Former Ozzy Osbourne Guitarist Jake E. Lee Shot in Random Attack
item.description: Jake E. Lee was shot multiple times in Las Vegas but is expected to fully recover.

item.title: Sick New World 2025 Lineup Announced: Metallica, Linkin Park & More
item.description: Metallica and Linkin Park headline Sick New World 2025, marking a shift from the festival’s usual nü-metal focus.

item.title: The Surprise You Missed in Korn’s 1997 Track "A.D.I.D.A.S."
item.description: Jonathan Davis’s son Nathan can be heard cooing during the breakdown of Korn’s 1997 track “A.

item.title: Ice Nine Kills Drummer Patrick Galante Steps Down
item.description: Patrick Galante has left Ice Nine Kills after 6 years with the band.

item.title: Judas Priest's Rob Halford: "Political Debates Are Harder Than Ever"
item.description: Rob Halford comments on the growing political polarization, lamenting the loss of civil debates.

item.title: Static-X: No Full Albums, But Maybe Singles, Says Tony Campos
item.description: Tony Campos says Static-X will continue as long as the band is having fun and fans keep showing up.

item.title: Watch: Korn Celebrates 30 Years with Epic Anniversary Concert in Los Angeles
item.description: Korn celebrated their 30th anniversary with a massive show at BMO Stadium in Los Angeles, featuring special guests like Evanescence, Gojira, and more.

item.title: Watch: DREAM THEATER Releases 'Night Terror' Video Ahead of 'Parasomnia' Album
item.description: DREAM THEATER announces new album “Parasomnia”, releasing February 7, 2025.

item.title: John 5 Breaks Silence on Relationship With Rob Zombie After Joining Mötley Crüe
item.description: John 5 hasn’t spoken to Rob Zombie since leaving his band to join Mötley Crüe in 2022, though there’s no bad blood.

item.title: Korn's Original Drummer David Silveria Opens Up on 30th Anniversary
item.description: David Silveria celebrates the 30th anniversary of Korn’s debut album with a nostalgic Instagram post.

item.title: KORN's Debut Album Turns 30: Jonathan Davis Reflects on the Band's Legacy
item.description: KORN celebrated the 30th anniversary of their self-titled debut album with a special concert at BMO Stadium in Los Angeles.

item.title: Shavo Odadjian’s Seven Hours After Violet Drops New Single "Cry"; VIDEO
item.description: Seven Hours After Violet, led by Shavo Odadjian, releases the music video for their single “Cry.

item.title: Scott Stapp Reflects on Sobriety: "Drinking is No Longer an Option"
item.description: Scott Stapp opens up about maintaining sobriety and creating a sober environment while on tour.

item.title: Cradle of Filth to Release New Single: Dani Filth Promises Fans Will "Love It"
item.description: Cradle of Filth will release a new single in October 2024, ahead of their European tour.

item.title: Roger Miret Opens Up His Hardcore Archives in "With Time"
item.description: Roger Miret releases a new book, “With Time,” chronicling the early years of Agnostic Front and the rise of the New York hardcore scene.

item.title: James Hetfield: "We Don’t Want to Be a Legacy Band That Only Plays Hits"
item.description: James Hetfield states Metallica doesn’t want to become a “legacy band” that only plays greatest hits.

item.title: SKILLET's John Cooper on Political Divides in Rock: "We're Shut Out"
item.description: John Cooper of SKILLET shares how his political and faith-based views have led to exclusion in the music industry.

item.title: Korn and Adidas Pay Tribute to 1994 with New Superstar Shoes
item.description: Korn and Adidas release a new Superstar shoe inspired by the band’s 1994 debut album.

item.title: Cliff Burton's Spirit Lives On in Metallica's Music, Says James Hetfield
item.description: James Hetfield still channels Cliff Burton’s influence when writing Metallica songs.

item.title: Ted Nugent Praises Metallica’s "Soulful" Groove While Criticizing Pantera
item.description: Ted Nugent praised METALLICA for playing “soulful heavy metal” with a rhythm-and-blues influence.

item.title: Slipknot and Estate of Joey Jordison Settle Lawsuit Quietly
item.description: Settlement Reached: Joey Jordison’s estate and Slipknot have settled a lawsuit, with terms undisclosed.

item.title: 'Master Of Puppets' Wins Out for Shavo Odadjian in METALLICA Album Showdown
item.description: Shavo Odadjian picks ‘Master Of Puppets’ over ‘Ride The Lightning’, citing the track ‘Orion’ as the deciding factor.

item.title: KORN’s Brian 'Head' Welch on Mortality: "I Want to Die in a Bed, Not On Stage"
item.description: Brian “Head” Welch is considering retirement within the next 10 years but insists he won’t fake it if the band starts to sound outdated.

item.title: Metallica Confirms 2025 Headline Tour with Iconic Support Acts
item.description: Metallica announces a 2025 North American tour with 21 dates, including headline slots at Sick New World and Sonic Temple festivals.

item.title: Watch: Korn Performs "Hey Daddy" Live for First Time Since 1999
item.description: Korn played “Hey Daddy” live for the first time since 1999.

item.title: Korn Kicks Off 2024 Tour with a Nostalgic Setlist in Tampa
item.description: Korn kicked off their North American tour in Tampa, reviving deep cuts like “Hey Daddy” (first time since 1999).

item.title: Korn Invites Fans to Create Art for 30th Anniversary—See How You Can Get Involved
item.description: Korn launches a fan art contest to celebrate 30 years of their legacy.

item.title: Study Shows Korn Fans Get the Best Value for Their Tickets
item.description: Korn offers the best value per minute at concerts, with an average cost of 39 cents per minute.

item.title: Phil Labonte: Korn’s Impact on Deathcore Goes Beyond Nu-Metal
item.description: Phil Labonte credits Korn with influencing the rise of deathcore through their innovative heavy sound.

item.title: Korn Showed Us the Ropes, Mötley Crüe Wanted Us Off the Stage, Says Jacoby Shaddix
item.description: Papa Roach had their best tour experiences with Korn in 2000, learning the ropes from them.

item.title: Korn's Hits Get a Lo-Fi Makeover—And They Approve
item.description: Korn approved a lo-fi instrumental cover album of their hits by lonelyboy.

item.title: Brian “Head” Welch Explains Korn’s Shift to Seven-String Guitars
item.description: Korn’s signature sound with seven-string guitars began when James “Munky” Shaffer was inspired by Steve Vai to pick up the instrument.

item.title: Brian Welch on Korn's New Album: “The Heaviest in Years”
item.description: Korn’s guitarist Brian “Head” Welch claims the band’s upcoming music will be the heaviest they’ve produced in years.

item.title: Korn’s Creative Process: Ray Luzier Breaks Down the Band’s Approach
item.description: Ray Luzier praises Korn’s willingness to experiment, from dubstep collaborations to returning to analog recording.

item.title: Korn Announces 30th Anniversary Concert with Star-Studded Lineup
item.description: Korn will celebrate the 30th anniversary of their debut album with a huge show at BMO Stadium in Los Angeles on October 5, 2024.

item.title: Korn’s Brian “Head” Welch Fights Back Against Mental Health Struggles
item.description: Partnership: Welch has co-founded Atlantic Behavioral Health, a treatment center focused on providing intensive outpatient care for mental health issues in Massachusetts and New Hampshire.

item.title: Watch: Korn Meets Vanessa Carlton in a Bizarre Mashup
item.description: Korn’s nu-metal style mashed up with Vanessa Carlton’s “A Thousand Miles” surprisingly works.

item.title: Korn's Brian Welch Introduces New Record Label XOVR Records; VIDEO
item.description: Brian “Head” Welch from Korn launches XOVR Records with manager David W.

item.title: Korn's Next Album in 2024 Could Be Their First Without Fieldy
item.description: Korn is working on new music for 2024, according to Brian “Head” Welch.

item.title: Watch: Exclusive Footage of Metallica's Phantom Lord from Jon Zazula Tribute
item.description: Metallica released official footage of their performance of Phantom Lord during a tribute show for former manager Jon Zazula.

item.title: Watch: Metallica Pays Tribute to Megaforce Founders with Old-School Set
item.description: Metallica performed a special tribute show honoring Jon Zazula and his wife, Marsha, featuring songs from their first two albums.
